97.movie_plot: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

79.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

76.movie_plot: The turtles find themselves transported back in time to ancient Japan.

70.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

7.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

24.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
